Sentece: The sensitivity of this assay--limit of detection 0.2 ng ml-1 plasma with a signal-to-noise ratio of 5:1--allowed measurement of the kinetics of the racemate and of both stereoisomers for the first time.
Title: A gas chromatographic/mass spectrometric assay for prenylamine suitable for pharmacokinetic studies of the racemate and the enantiomers.
Name: Prenylamine

Sentece: Terminal elimination half-life was 14.1 h (SD: 6.9 h).
Title: Pharmacokinetics of prenylamine racemate and enantiomers in man.

Sentece: Mean residence time of racemic prenylamine was found to be 14.7 h (SD: 3.8 h).

Sentece: The relative bioavailability of prenylamine (Segontin 100) was 82.2% (SD: 9.9%) determined in six healthy volunteers.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of prenylamine racemate and enantiomers in man.

Sentece: The absolute bioavailability was estimated to be in the order of 15%.
